scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/uv && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/titaniumnetwork-dev/Ultraviolet-Static/main/public/uv/uv.bundle.js -o public/uv/uv.bundle.js && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/titaniumnetwork-dev/Ultraviolet-Static/main/public/uv/uv.client.js -o public/uv/uv.client.js && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/titaniumnetwork-dev/Ultraviolet-Static/main/public/uv/uv.handler.js -o public/uv/uv.handler.js && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/titaniumnetwork-dev/Ultraviolet-Static/main/public/uv/uv.sw.js -o public/uv/uv.sw.js && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/titaniumnetwork-dev/Ultraviolet-Static/main/public/uv/uv.config.js -o public/uv/uv.config.js
